about_the_game:
Dungeons & Dragons Player's Handbook - 50th Anniversary Edition

Celebrate 50 years of adventure with the new and improved Player’s Handbook, the ultimate guide for fifth edition D&D players. Play your way with optimized rules for character creation and advancement, exploration, combat, equipment, spells, and much more. Create fantastic heroes from an expanded selection of character origins, classes, and subclasses, all revised and balanced for maximum fun.

Pre-Order Information:
Introducing the 50th Anniversary Edition of the Dungeons & Dragons Player's Handbook, now available for pre-order exclusively on Fantasy Grounds! Secure your copy today, and it will be seamlessly linked to your Fantasy Grounds account, unlocking automatically as a new update on the official release date of September 17, 2024. Please note that this is a digital-only version, designed to provide you with the ultimate online tabletop experience. Don’t miss out on being part of this milestone in D&D history—pre-order now and prepare for endless quests and epic journeys!

Key Features:
  • Dive into the biggest Player’s Handbook in Dungeons & Dragons history, thoughtfully redesigned based on 10 years of feedback from the D&D community. 
  • Improved layout and organization help you find the information you’re looking for more easily and clearly. 
  • The ideal start to your D&D adventures, with updated learn-to-play and character creation sections.
  • Expanded player options! Customize your character with 12 classes, 48 subclasses, 10 species, 16 backgrounds, and 75 feats, revised and balanced for maximum fun.
  • Marvel at new illustrations and a streamlined design that make every page a joy to experience.
  • Locate rules information easily with an alphabetized Rules Glossary.
  • Explore more than 380 spells, including all-new additions to your arsenal.
  • Get greater versatility in combat with new Weapon Masteries.
  • Craft new items and discover fresh ways to utilize your tools with a new Tools & Crafting System.
